data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Marris, John W. M., Ślipiński, Adam (2014): A revision of the Pediacus Shuckard 1839 (Coleoptera: Cucujidae) of Asia and Australasia. Zootaxa 3754 (1), DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.1.2
